title: House of Blood and Fae
description: Monsters roam Victorian London. I’m one of them.DrustanAsher and I were once lovers. We should be enemies. Instead, our reluctant attachment has placed us squarely in the middle of a war.VioletBetrayed by my brother, I’m spirited away by a stranger and discover that my life has been a lie.AsherWhen I make a bargain with a mortal, I gain an unexpected mystery. My heart tells me Violet can save Drustan. My magic tells me she’s the one who can save Faerie.
author: Harper Helton
